website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, you get a lot of utensils for the value price. You'd have a difficult time finding a better deal.
pros: A comprehensive set with 25 utensils for an affordable price
Made of nonstick nylon and stainless steel that's designed to fit most meal prep needs
cons: Some of the utensil tops feel a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Utensil Set. Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality kitchen set. The Yitchen set definitely exceeds my expectation. So much for so little. Check out my video review to see for yourself. I would highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Al R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to give my kitchen the fresh start it deserves
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to give my kitchen a fresh start. I inherited a whole bunch of dodgy kitchenware and finally it was time to chuck everything out and give my kitchen the upgrade it deserves. So glad I did. I saw this 25-piece utensil set by Yitchen and it looked great. Arrived soon after I ordered and I'm very pleased. It has everything I need (spatulas, tongs, measuring sets, cork screw etc) and a couple of things I never knew I would enjoy like the pizza cutters and zester. Definitely recommend this to anyone who wants a fresh start to their kitchen or is setting up a new one. Thanks Yitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: the spatulas handle is the only one that come apart - but the seller was nice and helped me with that
customer_reviews.text: This set is alright. The majority of the utensils that have the handle, a lot of them have come loose, the spatulas handle is the only one that come apart - but the seller was nice and helped me with that. I do not put these in the dishwasher, not sure if they're dish washer safe. I find since the handles are loose, if you get water inside the handles and don't properly dry them, it gets really gross inside and the liquid comes out looking like rusty water.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lu

customer_reviews.title: Spend a buck and buy better quality
customer_reviews.text: Very chinsy! Peeler didn't work and can opener is difficult to use. Should've known, you get what you pay for! After posting my review, I was contacted by the seller and refunded my full purchase amount without having to return the set. This is good business etiquette and much apprecited
customer_reviews.author: bonnie m long

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy - rather get less items but better quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. I can already foresee these rusting. The utensils with the plastic heads are also wimpy. This is good for a college student or someone that rarely cooks. If you are planning to use this often...then invest in one with better quality and longterm use.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 5 stars because of how cheap it is and what you get. If I expected everything to last a decade, I wouldn't buy this and I would spend 10-20 times the amount. This is a perfect starter set and gives you almost everything you need in a kitchen. As items break you can replace them with better quality, and longer lasting, items.
customer_reviews.author: sgbolt

customer_reviews.title: which is like a shell piece
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced and there's a piece of plastic in the middle of the handle, which is like a shell piece, which often become loose. Water also ALWAYS gets trapped in here. So if you are cooking, and go to stir something, droplets of water spill out. I always have to make sure to shake it over the sink before actually using them. Overall it's just not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Just moved into my first apartment and needed as much as I could get for a not over-the-top price. Overall I'm happy with the items, some of them I probably won't use but you really can't beat the price for what you get. Quality isn't bad, however, there is a rattling in the base of one of my spatulas, and the second time I used the pizza cutter it bent fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: MGcuse

customer_reviews.title: This kitchen set is good, however I did notice that it was missing ...
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen set is good, however I did notice that it was missing a pasta spoon and a soup ladle (which wasn't a big deal). It does the job, however, some of the pieces are not as sturdy as I expected. For the potato masher, the chrome (metal/plastic piece?) is not glued entirely to the rest of the utensil so it is wiggly. The ice cream scooper, was a little wobbly when I tried using it the first time, but overall, but as previously stated, it gets the job done and I don't have any major complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t give this set a star if I didn’t have to. I needed an inexpensive set for my motorhome so I chose this one. Super flimsy, melts easily, and when I was hand washing with a sponge the logo on the handles came off. It was like it was melting off, I could smear it like tar with my finger. I didn’t have high expectations but geez! When I was flipping bacon the tips of the tongs melted. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for my husband who loves to cook and wanted a matching set instead of the ones we have accumulated over the years. Within 5 seconds of using the can opener it broke. When I washed all of the pieces before use, the handles filled up with water. Peeler barely works. I will definitely be returning these. Please don't buy these. Not worth the money AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieG

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! Do Not Buy These!!
customer_reviews.text: Put this set through the dish washer one time. Water gets into the handle of every one of them. When you take them out of the dishwasher, water filled with rust drips out of the handles. Absolutely disgusting! Can't believe Amazon allows products like this to be sold. Returning Immediately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 of the more important pieces are missing.
customer_reviews.text: So frustrating. We'rein the middle of doing some home remodeling and didn't open the package until after the window for returning the set had closed, which is our fault. But some vital pieces are missing. There is no ice cream scoop, no potato peeler, the bottle opener is missing as is the pizza cutter and fish scaler or the large slotted spoon. I'm not sure if I need to contact Amazon or the seller directly. I am giving this a 2-star rating as I'm not sure how the items hold up, etc since I haven't used them.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but...
customer_reviews.text: Great items. HOWEVER... very cheap and dont work well... and dont last very long if using everyday... would not really recommend if you cook on a reg basis....Handles fill with water when put in dishwasher and leak out... plastic is kinda flimsy etc
customer_reviews.author: Bill E

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought this set. Great value for the price. I love the spatula; it's huge. I can flip omelets and pancakes comfortably. It's bigger than the standard spatula and it's great. Haven't used everything from the set yet, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: reinamorena

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product on 5/02/20 and. am disappointed with the quality. of the product. The first, and only item, I have used so far is the ice cream scoop on some frozen yogurt, which is not very difficult to scoop. The ice cream scoop bent immediately on the first attempt to scoop out a portion. This does not give me much confidence the other items such as the cheese grater, pizza slicer, peelers, masher, or corkscrew will beans. better when needed.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Everything will bend under the slightest pressure. Worth getting something else for a little extra $$
customer_reviews.author: Paul Springer

customer_reviews.title: Can Opener is broken for the first time use.
customer_reviews.text: As title. My old can opener is not working so i used the newly purchased can opener from this set. the can opener is broken for the first time use. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennywhite

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: These items came quickly and it was convenient having everything you need delivered at once. However, the wine opener broke on first use, the peelers are low quality and barely peel. The spatulas/spoons haven't been used much but seem fine quality. You get what you pay for, this set is cheap and the quality seems cheap.
customer_reviews.author: sw123

customer_reviews.title: Washed and BROKE
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this last week...... washed and hand dried all the tools and the 1/3 cup handle broke on me..., everything is fine for now but right now it's a disappointment and would like a refund. I DID NOT PLACE IN THE DISHWASHER BECAUSE THE DIRECTIONS STATE TO HANDWASH. Update: Mama Bear sent me an email and I explained the situation and she was extremely helpful! I went from two stars to four for great customer care!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Blonski

customer_reviews.title: Everything u need in one box
customer_reviews.text: Moving out of my family’s house I needed my own set and this was the perfect one! Had everything I needed in one box to start off with
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: a couple of the utensils seemed pretty fragile and did break which was a bit disappointing ...
customer_reviews.text: a couple of the utensils seemed pretty fragile and did break which was a bit disappointing (pizza cutter/peeler) a wide selection in the set which i knew going in, but i wish i would have chosen a set that had a variety of sizes of the most used utensils, but that is my fault
customer_reviews.author: curt paulson

customer_reviews.title: Not the best buy.
customer_reviews.text: These plastic cooking utensils were not very strong. The spatula was not able to turn a pancake over, and most of the pieces fell apart or simply broke. I would not waste your money on this produce
customer_reviews.author: Tina McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: These suck. Water gets Trapped in the handles and gets moldy and gross when it’s left in there. Went to go cook eggs and dirty water came from the handle of the spatula. Also went to go scoop ice cream and the whole spoon bent in half ... the plastic was melting when I was cooking food !!! I wouldn’t buy..
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dapontes

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve used the ice cream scoop and the wine bottle opener, both of which broke the first time I used them. I also washed the set when I first got it and a few of the pieces are already rusting after just 1 wash. Don’t waste your money, just get a real set if you intend to actually use them.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Pack, Very Comprehensive
customer_reviews.text: The tools are all in good condition. The cork opener did not seem the sturdiest so I kept my old one. For the price, it is a great variety and great for starting a new place or for a college student.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: No Bueno
customer_reviews.text: Absolute waste of money...quality is low and the utensils are flimsy...ie...ice cream scoop bends at use on scoopable not frozen ice cream. Disappointed in previous reviews that are absolutely a lie.
customer_reviews.author: malcolm m.

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: potato peeler was hard to use and did not work well, 1/4 cup measure missing. they later refunded us for the errant parts all is well
customer_reviews.author: jeff bergman

customer_reviews.title: Spatula melted first time using it, ice cream scoop ...
customer_reviews.text: Spatula melted first time using it, ice cream scoop bent first time using it, everything is really flimsy. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Weak handles
customer_reviews.text: Whisk is great. Nice grips on the items below but very flimsy handles. Bend too easy. Slotted Spoon Slotted Turner - forget turning fried potatoes. Ladle Spatula Company was very easy to work with and refunded the purchase price very quickly. Now that impresses me.
customer_reviews.author: Gina L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for new and old cooks
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of products you can keep them for yourself or gift them to others they work really well
customer_reviews.author: Lj

customer_reviews.title: great deal, the tools are sturdy and can be ...
customer_reviews.text: great deal, the tools are sturdy and can be used without worrying about breakage. thanks for such a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Engel

customer_reviews.title: I do think this would be good even for family homes
customer_reviews.text: Very adequate beginner set. Has at least one of the basic utensils you may need for a kitchen, as described. Neat packaging and everything was on time. I'm a college student, I have no complaints. I do think this would be good even for family homes. They may just want more than 1 spoon or something "
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great selection. I bought it to be used in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great selection. I bought it to be used in a vacation rental property and it pretty much covers anything someone working in the kitchen might need.
customer_reviews.author: mmoruss

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as advertised. The quality is good, and they have been useful.
customer_reviews.author: Stevae

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this set because I just moved to my first house. Figured decent deal for the price. In the month I've lived here the cork screw is broken(used once) the ice cream scoop is broken(used twice) and the potato masher is mangled(came in the box as such). I do not recommend this product unless you're looking for a 1 time use situation.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Quality set but not enough spatulas
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality utility set. As a set, there are a few items we don’t use (corkscrew for example) but most people probably would. No true ladle. The spatula and potato smasher are excellent. Major disappointment: no ladle and you apparently can’t buy extra spatulas.
customer_reviews.author: hal braswell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Total crap. I kept noticing rust drops every now and then,they were coming out of the spoon and spatula handles, guess they hold water in after washing,Hope none got in my food. Yuck!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my marriage!
customer_reviews.text: Saved my life.... My wife was complaining that she had to break the top of the wine bottle cause i lost our wine opener, but instead, i got her a whole set and replaced everything with brand new utensils.
customer_reviews.author: TechReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Love them so far - really nicely made and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: sal nuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Missing items from the Set
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this purchase. After opening the amazon box I find a what seems to be opened utensil box. Needless to say, I am missing my pizza cutter, ice cream spoon, rubber spatula, cheese grader, and bottle opener. Amazon customer service helped me out with a full refund. Using the picture I posted, simple math would say after missing 5 items. But when adding the number of items in the picture there is 19.... so still missing one item but can’t figure out which item.
customer_reviews.author: DB3094

customer_reviews.title: amazing value for amazing products
customer_reviews.text: I use these as a professional chef in the kitchen and love all of the utensils! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Will buy again if I had too
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. The first time I used the ice cream scooper it bent back and almost snapped. So I already had to buy another. The rest will suffice but I definitely will be replacing each piece sooner than expected
customer_reviews.author: Yellowbird

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Words washed off within the first wash of them. Can opener broke while opening the first can...... pizza cutter flimsy and broke while cutting pizza.... worst set I’ve ever bought and worst item I’ve ever received from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: New Year, New Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at how complete this set is. I had a few pieces and now have everything. Out with the old and in with the new!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: complete kit of kitchen utensils! Bought for my son who is moving to his own place after college!
customer_reviews.author: Kingfisher

customer_reviews.title: but it is a nice assortment. It is a good starter set for ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the chance to use many of the pieces, yet, but it is a nice assortment. It is a good starter set for someone who isn't a serious cook but who does like to eat.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Utter Garbage
customer_reviews.text: First use of the serving spoon in some rice and it snapped in half...definitely get what you pay for with this set. Spend the extra money and get a real set. You know, one for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M Sahhar

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat the price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I needed Kitchen utensils, but didn't want to spend a fortune buying each one individually. I found Yitchen and was blown away by what you get for the price! The quality is amazing! I'll definitely be buying more for friends and family as house warming gifts!
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: The set is pretty handy and provide what you need for a kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: The set is pretty handy and provide what you need for a kitchen specially if you just thinking about getting kitchen stuff for the first time and materials are pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Al Hasani

customer_reviews.title: Some of the items are great, some are absolute crap
customer_reviews.text: Some of the items are great, some are absolute crap. The peeler couldn't cut into the skin of an apple I had.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any new home!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact it has all the tools you need to start a new home at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: KatFish

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set, the ice cream scooper and pizza cutter ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set, the ice cream scooper and pizza cutter are miniature size. But I was moving in on my own and needed them, still gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and the person said they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy set... perfect set for those starting out!
customer_reviews.text: This set is a perfect addition to our kitchen and will be perfect for anyone starting out in an apartment or new home. Everything you need and some you never though you would need! Great quality material and very sturdy. Would definitely recommend for purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Byrne

customer_reviews.title: The gateway to tasty.
customer_reviews.text: Flippin sanniches like a champ with my new utensils. I'd give you 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant when buy at the price I paid but great quality great packaging sturdy utensils
customer_reviews.author: Caly & Jaclyn - Zyia Girls

customer_reviews.title: Could be very disgusting if you don’t keep on top of
customer_reviews.text: Water gets caught in the handle. Could be very disgusting if you don’t keep on top of that
customer_reviews.author: alissa

customer_reviews.title: This is a good set for a student or for someone who just ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set for a student or for someone who just needs a cheap set of utensils. The utensils are hit and miss. Some have already broken, others are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set good quality it could use a solid spatula ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set good quality it could use a solid spatula but other wise perfect. The can opener is so smooth and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Olson1983

customer_reviews.title: The larger utensils came in good condition and work very well in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The larger utensils came in good condition and work very well in the kitchen. I docked 1 star because one of the measuring cups came broken and I felt the other measuring cups would also break in due time. However, upon notifying Yitchen of the situation, they gladly refunded me enough money to purchase stainless steel measuring cups.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Block

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sturdy set! All utensils were included as advertised. And I can attest to the fact that the wine opener does work!
customer_reviews.author: Dorisa

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: The measuring cups handles were broke, but the company did not hesitate to make it right. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K. Rednin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A lot comes with this set! It's a great starter set and everything works well. The only think I do t like is it is cheeply made so water collects in the handles of some of them. Good for a start but won't last super long
customer_reviews.author: Sara McMillan

customer_reviews.title: its okay. I had to be careful when putting ...
customer_reviews.text: its okay. I had to be careful when putting these in the dishwasher. must put them in with the handle up or else water will het inside the handle.
customer_reviews.author: TaleciaP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Box delivered in had come apart but liked the durability and variety of the the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: TSaun

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very cheep do not believe it to be worth what I paid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this item for our college bound son and he loved having the set
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item for our college bound son and he loved having the set! He loves to cook by the way.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kunkle

customer_reviews.title: Most the items will be okay in a pinch but I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The ice cream scoop bent on first use. Most the items will be okay in a pinch but I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JD Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who just moved into her first apartment. She needed everything and this set helped put a dent in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and sturdy. Wish there was a pasta scoop included.
customer_reviews.author: RJNANNASMUM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Quality set for a great price. Shipping was very quick! Love the set and plan to order more for my vacation rentals.
customer_reviews.author: Derrek

customer_reviews.title: Double Check the item before send to deliver
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say, it's good material but the problem is lack of two item supposed to have 25 items. I only got 23 because I don't need two egg mixer, I need the serving/cooking spoon it's not in the box also the flour spoon..
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Quick Shipping
customer_reviews.text: This set came in quick and seems to have everything someone would need to get started in a new home. The kitchen tools seem to be sturdy although I haven't used them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Yee

customer_reviews.title: The company was easy to work with to resolve the issue
customer_reviews.text: The measuring cups broke after scooping out flour. The flipper melted after using it to make pancakes. The company was easy to work with to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these and the price for everything you get!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Receive on time
customer_reviews.text: I receive all itens on time, and I love it. But I found the rice spoon a little big
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Gardini Maciel

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for the money but to much branding on the handle. For a vacation rental they are fine
customer_reviews.author: Marc V Russo

customer_reviews.title: 3 month review.
customer_reviews.text: The ice cream scooper bends really easy and the spatuala stores water from the dishwasher. Other then that was a great buy for someone just moving out.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Rokisky

customer_reviews.title: The products look great for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The products look great for the kitchen. So many items included in the set but the spatulas are soft. Not hard enough for steering.
customer_reviews.author: FE LORMA F RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I know have more utensils than I know what to do with. :)
customer_reviews.author: burn70down

customer_reviews.title: Great value set
customer_reviews.text: Great value set, alot of various usefull utensils. Used a couple so far and I am statisfied with them. Would recommend to anyone looking for a great variety set.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: I like the utensils. They are definitely not as sturdy as my kitchen aid ones and I was also missing items from my set...
customer_reviews.author: Meranda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Box was flimsy but all the gadgets are gonna be real useful.
customer_reviews.author: alphabetgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great starting utensil set for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have used this set of utensils multiple times in the past few weeks after receiving it. The set comes with everything but the kitchen sink! (and the food). Perfect for anyone just looking for all the basic utensils for a new kitchen! I would very much reccommend it to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: J Carey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my utensil set. Quality is just as good as some of the name brands in the store
customer_reviews.author: NCshorty

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This set is a great value for the cost, you get all the basic kitchen necessities if you're just starting out. The quality is pretty good except the measuring cups. The ring around the cups arrived broken and the owner was nice enough to refund me the exact amount to replace them
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: meh...
customer_reviews.text: Some water gets in the handles when putting through the dishwasher. Not necessarily quality, but it's a starter set...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lengefeld

customer_reviews.title: The price is perfect for the amount of utensils you get
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a wedding gift. The price is perfect for the amount of utensils you get.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in my RV. Has everything I need did not have to add anything.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect for my cooking and entertaining needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for when we go on trips in my camper, it's perfect for my cooking and entertaining needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, Happy life.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and useful combination of tools. Happy wife, Happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Hasan

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETELY worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these kitchen utensils! I never knew I needed a potato masher, but I haven't stopped using it since I got it!
customer_reviews.author: London Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Items fall apart easily. Not great quality! Wpuldnt purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase. It's a great deal, wonderful functional pieces for the kitchen. Prompt and great customer service. Wish all businesses ran this way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice complete set of kitchen tools at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The set is very complete with every item you might need. It arrived in two days!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: This set is very useful!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my daughter. She is setting up her new home.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: The products themselves look very nice, and all are helpful
customer_reviews.author: Roderic Fuller

product_meta.title: 25-Piece Kitchen Tool & Utensil Set, Cooking Gadgets, Stainless Steel & Nylon
feature_bullets: QUALITY 25 PC. KITCHEN UTENSILS SET - Yes, your friends will think you spent a fortune on your modern cooking utensils. This finely crafted, beautiful utensil set finally gives you the right to call yourself "Master Chef". Yes, you'll finally have every cooking tool you need to whip up gourmet meals in no time flat. This also makes a perfect kitchen gadget gift for students, newlyweds, and cooks.

FULL COOKING TOOLS SET - Are you tired of not having the right kitchen utensil for the job? And aren't you sick of dealing with flimsy spatulas, cheap pizza cutters, junky can openers, leaky measuring cups, broken tongs, and dull peelers? YOU DESERVE BETTER THAN THIS. Your family deserves better. Your guests deserve better. Yes. It's time you took a stand and waged war against cheap cooking sets.

MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE - Yitchen offers you the highest quality stainless steel cooking utensil set featuring supreme nylon gripped handles. We are so confident that you’ll fall in love with our cooking tools set that we offer you a "Love it or return it guarantee". There’s no risk. Click “Add to Cart” now and feel the difference of quality.

INSPIRED BY MOM - Remember being little and standing on a chair helping Mom cook in the kitchen? Yitchen is a Mom & Son owned business inspired by the “good old days”. Frustrated by poor quality from other cheap kitchen utensil sets, we decided to take on the ‘big brands’ and create the ultimate kitchen starter set that will truly last you a lifetime. This is the last kitchen gadget set you need.

UNLEASH YOUR INNER COOK - The secret to great cooking is in the preparation. And thanks to our exclusive, modern, and sleek kitchen utensils, you'll finally have every tool you need for the job. Cooking will not only be more fun and enjoyable for your family, but you can also say goodbye to hiding your utensils in your drawer. These high-quality utensils are perfect to place on a hanging rack.
